intro.bio: My goal for the near future is experiencing and being professional in many different programming languages and technologies. Thus I would like to be a Full-stack developer or in a position which is flexible for trying various roles. In order to achieve the goal, I have been learning and practicing projects at school as well as in my free time at home!
